name: The Order of Baphomet
description:
You are Azazel, the son of the current leader of the Order of Baphomet. Your 18th birthday is soon approaching, and with it, your inauguration to become the next Prophet. However, the Order may not be the paradise you were always told it was. 

The fate of the Order and its people lies in your hands. What will you choose?

Features:

  • Psychological visual novel with 4+ unique characters!
  • Three different endings based on your choices!
  • Tons of bonus art in Gallery unlockable after unlocking all endings!

Credits

  •  Ivy Tang: Writing (IG: @ivytangerine)
  •  Trang Do: Background art & GUI art
  •  Oto ██████: Character art
  •  Ben Slattery: Sound effects & Music
  •  Jack Zhu: Music
  •  Miles Blumenau: Programming
  •  HyunJoon Kim: Programming

Made for Jam-O-Lantern 2022, 10-21 through 11-4!
